name: v1.0.0-rc.4
body:
## `MODULE.bazel` Usage
```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "protovalidate", version = "1.0.0-rc.4")
```

## `WORKSPACE` Usage
```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "com_github_bufbuild_protovalidate",
    sha256 = "2696d31de3fda2d73f63dfadfd0983f3b8652fae48458b9848a7e84be26fff0d",
    strip_prefix = "protovalidate-1.0.0-rc.4",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/releases/download/v1.0.0-rc.4/protovalidate-v1.0.0-rc.4.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```

## What's Changed
* Add implicit `IGNORE_IF_UNPOPULATED` for `MessageOneofRule` fields by @srikrsna-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/382
* Add test case for ignore override in message oneof rule by @srikrsna-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/383
* Add test case for too many selected fields with required MessageOneofRule by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/384


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v1.0.0-rc.3...v1.0.0-rc.4

name: v0.12.0
body:
## `MODULE.bazel` Usage
```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "protovalidate", version = "0.12.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` Usage
```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "com_github_bufbuild_protovalidate",
    sha256 = "990fef0b4d0beeaa1581f4cb6ddcce19363b43b62d6526e75d9a8e4f78e7468f",
    strip_prefix = "protovalidate-0.12.0",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/releases/download/v0.12.0/protovalidate-v0.12.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
* Add TypeScript / JavaScript to the supported languages in README.md by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/359
* Clarify required behavior for map keys/values and repeated items by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/360
* Bump golang.org/x/sync from 0.13.0 to 0.14.0 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/361
* Removing extra linefeed before TimestampRules.example by @jrinehart-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/364
* Upgrade to use v2 for buf.yaml by @smaye81 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/366
* Add conformance tests for testing WKT rules on incorrect types by @smaye81 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/365
* Fix incorrect examples by @smaye81 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/367


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.11.1...v0.12.0

name: v0.10.7
body:
## `MODULE.bazel` Usage
```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "protovalidate", version = "0.10.7")
```

## `WORKSPACE` Usage
```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "com_github_bufbuild_protovalidate",
    sha256 = "3f6d6945598031e12f3a4019b7c8e65467cd75cf96d6c9dfd85a3829f205b454",
    strip_prefix = "protovalidate-0.10.7",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/releases/download/v0.10.7/protovalidate-v0.10.7.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
This release removes our non-standard hack around reserved CEL identifiers and introduces a new CEL extension for getting a field of a protobuf message by field name string. Also, the updated documentation with formalized definitions for protovalidate CEL functions is restored now that implementations are catching up.

* Restore updated documentation in validate.proto by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/328
* Use getField CEL function by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/352


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.10.6...v0.10.7

## What's Changed

* Fix uint test by @smaye81 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/353


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.10.5...v0.10.6

name: v0.10.5
body:
## `MODULE.bazel` Usage
```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "protovalidate", version = "0.10.5")
```

## `WORKSPACE` Usage
```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "com_github_bufbuild_protovalidate",
    sha256 = "9d8d7955b6fe0451aee4b98ddca80ac52064dda4b52413ef0b2317bf76ec2c3f",
    strip_prefix = "protovalidate-0.10.5",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/releases/download/v0.10.5/protovalidate-v0.10.5.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
We now adhere to the [CEL string format extension specification](https://github.com/google/cel-spec/blob/master/doc/extensions/strings.md). Also, this release adds a myriad of new test cases that cover more edge cases.

* Prepare GitHub docs for shift to buf.build/docs by @jrinehart-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/317
* Bump golang.org/x/sync from 0.12.0 to 0.13.0 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/344
* Update tests to adhere to CEL formatting standard by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/345
* Add more tests for isUri and isHostname by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/346
* Add more tests for isHostAndPort by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/347
* Add tests for isEmail with surrounding newlines by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/348
* Add additional tests for map keys by @smaye81 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/349
* Add additional test cases for double colon in IPv6 by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/350


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.10.4...v0.10.5

* Add additional test cases for IPv6 by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/341
* Fix erroneous IGNORE_ALWAYS in conformance test case by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/340
* Add tests for required with IGNORE_ALWAYS by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/343


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.10.3...v0.10.4

name: v0.10.3
body:
## Breaking changes

This version of protovalidate includes breaking changes to the [conformance test harness](https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/tree/v0.10.3/tools/protovalidate-conformance). These changes will not affect you, unless you are authoring a protovalidate implementation and use the test harness.

We've added more test cases, made several small improvements to the test output, and made `--strict` the default behavior.

## `MODULE.bazel` Usage
```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "protovalidate", version = "0.10.3")
```

## `WORKSPACE` Usage
```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "com_github_bufbuild_protovalidate",
    sha256 = "12c6a8018ea57a941ede58a9273f266e180b1f0800d963527de26bb26c876004",
    strip_prefix = "protovalidate-0.10.3",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/releases/download/v0.10.3/protovalidate-v0.10.3.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
* Add tests for custom field constraints by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/329
* Do not output expected failures in conformance runner by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/331
* Delete the --json flag of the conformance runner by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/332
* Add field path details to the conformance runner output by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/333
* Delete the --strict flag of the conformance runner by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/334
* Print unexpected success cases in the conformance runner by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/335


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.10.2...v0.10.3

name: v0.10.2
body:
## Breaking changes

This version of protovalidate includes breaking changes to the [conformance test harness](https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/tree/v0.10.2/tools/protovalidate-conformance). These changes will not affect you, unless you are authoring a protovalidate implementation and use the test harness.

Test cases for `isEmail`, `isHostname`, `isHostAndPort`, `isIpPrefix`, `isIp`, `isUri`, and `isUriRef` have been added to the harness. `isEmail` follows the HTML standard now instead of RFC 5322. See #320 for details.


## `MODULE.bazel` Usage
```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "protovalidate", version = "0.10.2")
```

## `WORKSPACE` Usage
```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "com_github_bufbuild_protovalidate",
    sha256 = "2b0ebbccb4b27268845a2c31f9b17dd8752b36d877ba91a8b6d0ee672795e0d7",
    strip_prefix = "protovalidate-0.10.2",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/releases/download/v0.10.2/protovalidate-v0.10.2.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```

## What's Changed
* Add missing space to README by @stefanvanburen in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/316
* Move CEL extension documentation to buf.build/docs by @jrinehart-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/318
* Update protovalidate CEL functions by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/320
* Add tests for IGNORE_ALWAYS by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/322
* Fix examples in validate.proto by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/323
* Update copyright years by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/321
* Return error when processing conformance results by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/326
* Temporarily revert updates to the documentation in validate.proto by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/327

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.10.1...v0.10.2

name: v0.10.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Improve BCR release process by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/301
* Add new test cases for URI encoding by @smaye81 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/302
* Bump github.com/spf13/pflag from 1.0.5 to 1.0.6 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/304
* Clarify rule string.uri_ref by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/305
* Switch to datatracker.ietf.org for RFC links by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/306
* Bump golang.org/x/sync from 0.10.0 to 0.11.0 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/308
* Add additional test cases for URNs by @smaye81 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/307
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.36.4 to 1.36.5 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/309
* Test against specific Go version by @nicksnyder in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/311
* Document why CI doesn't push directly to the BSR by @nicksnyder in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/310
* Link to migration guide by @nicksnyder in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/313
* Optimize Bazel CI performance by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/312
* Migrate buf.gen.yaml to v2 by @pkwarren in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/314
* Mark FieldConstraints deleted values as reserved by @pkwarren in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/315

## New Contributors
* @smaye81 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/302

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.10.0...v0.10.1

name: v0.10.0
body:
## Breaking Changes
This version of protovalidate removes various deprecated fields and enumeration values:
- `skipped` on `FieldConstraints`: Set `ignore = IGNORE_ALWAYS` instead.
- `ignore_empty` on `FieldConstraints`: Set `ignore = IGNORE_IF_UNPOPULATED` instead.
- `field_path` on `Violation`: Use the structured `field` value instead.
- `IGNORE_EMPTY` on `Ignore`: Use the `IGNORE_IF_UNPOPULATED` enumeration value instead.
- `IGNORE_DEFAULT` on `Ignore`: Use the `IGNORE_IF_DEFAULT_VALUE` enumeration value instead.

These options had been deprecated for a while, and their replacements are already available, so you can migrate preemptively before updating to this release.

## `MODULE.bazel` Usage
```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "protovalidate", version = "0.10.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` Usage
```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "com_github_bufbuild_protovalidate",
    sha256 = "7c20845bda99287680c7993e56df8ce414484a83003a10bd0eba18c6db527027",
    strip_prefix = "protovalidate-0.10.0",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/releases/download/v0.10.0/protovalidate-v0.10.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```

## What's Changed
* Fix docs: expected-failures should be expected_failures by @nicksnyder in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/281
* Bump golang.org/x/sync from 0.9.0 to 0.10.0 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/282
* Pin bazel to last pre-8.x release by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/287
* Fix dead link in buf.build/bufbuild/protovalidate-testing README.md by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/286
* Add all conformance runner flags to the documentation by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/285
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.35.2 to 1.36.1 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/288
* Add support for bzlmod + Bazel 8 by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/289
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.36.1 to 1.36.2 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/293
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.36.2 to 1.36.3 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/295
* Move to the migration guide at Buf docs by @jrinehart-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/294
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.36.3 to 1.36.4 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/296
* Remove deprecated options by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/297
* Add BCR manifest and bzlmod E2E test by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/298

## New Contributors
* @jrinehart-buf made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/294

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.9.0...v0.10.0

name: v0.9.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.34.2 to 1.35.1 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/260
* Update dependencies by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/273
* Fix doc examples for string.example by @sudorandom in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/271
* Clarify that protovalidate does not require any code generation by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/278
* Clarify "custom validation functions" by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/279
* Bump github.com/stretchr/testify from 1.9.0 to 1.10.0 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/276
* Add structured field and rule paths to Violation by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/265

## New Contributors
* @timostamm made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/278

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.8.2...v0.9.0

name: v0.8.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Add more predefined rules conformance tests around repeated fields by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/258


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.8.1...v0.8.2

name: v0.8.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Revert "Revert protovalidate-testing changes" by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/256


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1

name: v0.8.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update example for checking uniqueness of repeated fields by @oliversun9 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/227
* Bump bufbuild/buf-setup-action from 1.34.0 to 1.35.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/229
* Add clarity around required/ignore documentation by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/230
* Update buf logo in README by @gilwong00 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/231
* Setup buf-action in CI by @emcfarlane in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/232
* Bump golang.org/x/sync from 0.7.0 to 0.8.0 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/234
* Fix old references to protoc-gen-validate in issue template by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/235
* Update Go to 1.23 + golangci-lint to 1.60.2 by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/241
* Add example options for most types by @sudorandom in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/239
* Bump github.com/bufbuild/protocompile from 0.14.0 to 0.14.1 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/243
* Fix mismatched example in sint32 and int64 suites by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/245
* Format example files containing message options by @oliversun9 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/247
* Format example proto files by @oliversun9 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/248
* Update CI to buf-action default behaviour by @emcfarlane in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/251
* Update cel expressions for standard constraints with bool type by @oliversun9 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/252
* Implement predefined field constraints by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/246
* Revert protovalidate-testing changes by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/254

## New Contributors
* @gilwong00 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/231
* @sudorandom made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/239

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.7.1...v0.8.0

name: v0.7.1

name: v0.6.4
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump github.com/bufbuild/protocompile from 0.9.0 to 0.10.0 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/193
* Bump bufbuild/buf-setup-action from 1.30.0 to 1.30.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/191
* Bump golang.org/x/sync from 0.6.0 to 0.7.0 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/192
* Bump github.com/bufbuild/protocompile from 0.10.0 to 0.11.0 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/199
* Colocate in-place migrator temp files to src directory by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/201
* Bump github.com/bufbuild/protocompile from 0.11.0 to 0.13.0 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/205
* Bump bufbuild/buf-setup-action from 1.30.1 to 1.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/204
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.33.1-0.20240408130810-98873a205002 to 1.34.0 in /tools by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/207
* Update Readme to use absolute links by @fyockm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/208
* Migrator: properly handle ignore generation on fields by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/209

## New Contributors
* @fyockm made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/208

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.6.3...v0.6.4

name: v0.6.3
body:

name: v0.6.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Update examples, conformance harness, & migrator to use new ignore/skipped annotations by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/173


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

name: v0.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Create add-to-project workflow by @chrispine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/167
* Add ignore enum conformance tests by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/170
* Add conformance tests for email addresses to cover semi-valid email a by @arun1587 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/163
* Add ignore enum examples by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/171
* Deprecate skipped rule + add IGNORE_ALWAYS to ignore rule + more explicit naming by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/172

## New Contributors
* @chrispine made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/167
* @arun1587 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/163

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/compare/v0.5.6...v0.6.0
